title: A gift idea for curious minds: Give them lifetime access to Rosetta Stone and StackSkills unlimited for under $160
content:
Macworld

This holiday, give them a gift they’ll use all year while sparing yourself the shipping anxiety. The Unlimited Lifetime Learning Bundle, which provides users with lifelong access to StackSkills Unlimited’s countless courses and all of Rosetta Stone’s languages, is the perfect digital gift that you can give right away. Through December 25, it’s only $159.97 (reg. $849) with code ROSETTA.

With Rosetta Stone, users can learn up to 24 languages, though only one at a time, using a method that’s won it accolades online and made it the preferred language training tool for NASA and Calvin Klein. This highly rated platform uses its proprietary speech recognition technology, TruAccent™, and immersive training designed by expert linguists to help you build usable conversational language skills quickly.

The other part of the bundle, StackSkills Unlimited, offers personal and professional training across over 1,000 courses taught by more than 350 of the top online instructors. Easy progress tracking and a carefully designed self-paced learning structure complement a “beginner-to-expert” training arc, whether you’re studying for a cybersecurity certification or learning a new instrument.

For a thoughtful last-minute gift, treat the learner on your list to platforms that could enrich their minds for life.

Grab this learning bundle featuring lifetime access to Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited for just $159.97 when you enter code ROSETTA at checkout. No coupon is needed, but this offer ends December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.
